original_title: Cross Canadian Ragweed: Back to Tulsa – Live and Loud at Cain's Ballroom
overview: The DVD was recorded July 14 and 15, 2006, at the historic Cain's Ballroom and Dancehall in Tulsa, Oklahoma, in front of sold-out crowds. This showcases the band's staggering musicianship and and off-the-charts energy level.
title: Cross Canadian Ragweed: Back to Tulsa – Live and Loud at Cain's Ballroom
